CatDescriptText: Mr. Anthony Franks, steelworker, Mt. Oliver and Miss Nancy DeMarco, student, Carnegie, were part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper, August 26, 1961, pg. 1 with question: "Do you think there will be war over Berlin?"   Mr. Franks' answer reads: "It's hard to figure this one out, but I think there will have to be a war before we can do anything about the crisis."  Ms. DeMarco's answer reads: "Yes, according to what the newspapers are saying."
TitMainTitle: Two frames: Portrait of Anthony Franks wearing striped polo shirt standing in front of block wall; Portrait of Nancy DeMarco wearing dark sleeveless eyelet shirt and circular brooch, holding paper bag
